entry.title: Buck, Bothered, and Bisexual
entry.summary:
Author: 1dalso

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,261Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 23

Summary: It’s as if time slows down, or the world comes to an abrupt halt.Not only is this guy probably the same age as Buck, but fuck. This might just be the hottest guy he’s ever seen— and he likes girls."Phew! That’s one fine man,” whistles Hen from the kitchen, sidling up besides Chimney, “And I like girls.”Buck eagerly nods in agreement, because who’s he kidding, he likes girls too. But hey, attraction is each to their own, and he finds whatever this is, quite attractive.He can unpack that later. Preferably at home. Maybe with a beer. Or two.—Buck and Eddie meet for the first time on the cusp of Buck's bisexual awakening. How much of the newbie, Eddie Diaz, can Buck handle before he takes matters into his own hands... and maybe gives those matters a kiss on the mouth?

entry.title: Fire on Fire (buddie)
entry.summary:
Author: scisaacsart

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,200Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 44

Summary: Eddie took two steps towards Buck, he was firm and decided — “Did I do something wrong?” — he mimicked Buck's voice, doing air quotes with his hands — “I decided to stay, it wasn't because Chimney told me to, it was because this is my home, and Christopher missed LA, and Christopher missed his Buck, and I missed my Buck, I need you, and you just come here and inform me that you're leaving us? And immediately start packing? You don't even give me an explanation? I stay for you and you don't even give me an explanation on why you're leaving me?” — he just let it all out on Buck, without realizing he got closer and closer to him at the point they're facing each other, very close, and he now has tears in his eyes that he's holding back, he was so honest.

entry.title: you weren't mine to lose
entry.summary:
Author: apricusapollo

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,900Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 12

Summary: In a way, Evan was always Eddie’s. He was never Tommy’s. He wasn’t Tommy’s to lose.And it hurts. It hurts worse than anything Tommy has ever experienced.Tommy had never experienced love this strong before Evan. He was the one that cared enough to show Tommy what it felt like to love and to be loved. He was the one who gave Tommy his heart, his mind, his everything. (or: after getting hurt on the job, Evan wakes up without five years worth of memories, ones that include the man he's married to. Knowing that he's married to Tommy and even remembering him doesn't change the fact that Evan is still in love with his best friend. Tommy knows that very well, but that doesn't make it hurt any less.)

entry.title: pretty like the sun
entry.summary:
Author: paleredheadinascifi

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,958Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 455

Summary: "Was the rest of it right?” Buck dares to ask. “Because, Eddie, if he’s right, if - -”Eddie grabs the paper towel from Buck’s grasp, pressing it to the cut. “If the magic fortune-telling conman correctly guessed that your unrequited gay crush isn’t so unrequited, then what, Buck? You think we’d fall in love? Happily ever after? I don’t know if you’ve noticed, but we don’t get those. I don’t get those. And I’m not - - I don’t - - I’m straight.” Or, Buck and Eddie stumble upon a tarot reader. He's a little too on the nose for Eddie's comfort.

entry.title: Between his hands - Part. 5 - Possession
entry.summary:
Author: 911_by_Jane

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,126Chapters: 2/5Kudos: 16

Summary: Where Buck and Eddie learn that giving up isn't synonymous with weakness.Eddie finally opens up, and Buck welcomes him cautiously. He’s already been hurt too much, and there’s no way he’s going to let Eddie hurt him again. Their balance is fragile but is heading toward a calmer relationship.Everything starts to shake again when Abby shows up, determined to win Buck back. Eddie is torn between jealousy, anger, and fear. Their relationship gets tense... but neither of them is willing to give up. For the first time, they really try to understand each other.When a hidden box reveals Eddie’s true intentions, a whole new language takes over: one of offered submission, absolute trust, and chosen possession.What if loving each other also meant choosing to fully give yourself?I'm not very good to English, so please forgive any mistakes I didn't spot (there may be a lot.)

entry.title: Superwoman: Last Responder
entry.summary:
Author: That_bitch_without_a_life

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,567Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 16

Summary: If anybody were to ask Kara why she chose to be a firefighter she’d tell you that she loves helping humanity and wants to give back to a community who gave so much to her when they so graciously took her in. If Kal El of Krypton asked Kara the same question she’d would’ve already thrown him into the sun, since it was his dumb idea to get her out into the ‘real world’.While there’s truth to the fact she wants to help, there’s nothing humanity has ever given her that she thinks she should pay them back for. Maybe she would help the Themyscirans for their training, however, she was already sufficient back on Krypton having been part of the army for years. But no, the reason Kara choose to be a firefighter was because it was a high energy job on a planet where she annoyingly couldn’t get drunk off her ass and thus needed something to keep her occupied.TLDR: this is a female buck fic if she was supergirl, just trust the process.

entry.title: Use me for shade
entry.summary:
Author: dearevanbuckley

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,257Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 73

Summary: Evan Buckley gets a new tattoo — three simple words: use me for shade. Eddie can’t stop staring at it, can’t stop wondering why it feels like an invitation written just for him.What starts as teasing banter turns into something neither of them can laugh off anymore. Between stolen touches, confessions, and two rounds that leave them both wrecked and raw, Buck and Eddie finally stop circling what’s been there all along.Tender, messy, intense, and achingly soft — it’s just them, and it’s enough.

entry.title: tendrils
entry.summary:
Author: the118forever

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,493Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 108

Summary: “So what’s the real reason?” he asks and watches Buck freeze in his peripheral. “The real reason for what?” “You know what, Buck. This new lease on getting out of Dodge and finding your own place.” “It’s just time. No other reason. It was always gonna end at– at some point, y’know? And Rav has a place that just freed up, it’s closer to the stati—” “I don’t need a sales pitch,” Eddie snarks, and the tendrils of thorny frustration curl up around his throat, pressing into the thin skin of his carotid artery. His pulse throbs. Or, it's raining in Los Angeles, and Eddie Diaz thinks he deserves it.
